attributes.action: Re-think the abolition of the 10p tax band
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We support the efforts of those MP's who are attempting to reverse the effects of the abolition of the 10p tax band .  
We are appalled that this government is forcing the poorest section of society to subsidise the tax cuts for everyone else .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
